text.language: Ouon ouhelpic n~tan: qen y/eyouab Maria: e~re V] nai nan: hiten necp~recbia.
We have hope, in Saint Mary, that God will have mercy on us, through her intercession.

language.div: Harapan kita Santa Maria, Allah akan mengasihani kita, melalui syafaatnya

text.language: لنا رجاء في القديسة مريم. الله يرحمنا بشفاعتها.
